mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_gender, mem_birth, mem_in_date, mem_up_date) VALUES ( #{mem_id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_gender}, #{mem_birth}, now(), now());
mapper.select: select count(mem_id) from member WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id};
select count(mem_phone) from member WHERE mem_phone = #{mem_phone};
